scripts.install-approov-config: func() { if [ -e "approov-initial.config" ]; then cp approov-initial.config android/app/src/main/assets/ && cp approov-initial.config ios/ShapesApp/; else echo "approov-initial.config doesn't exists in project root directory"; fi; }; func
scripts.create-ipa: rm -rf Payload Payload.zip && mkdir Payload && cp -r ios/build/ShapesApp/Build/Products/Debug-iphoneos/ShapesApp.app Payload/ && zip -9 -r Payload.zip Payload && mv Payload.zip Payload.ipa && rm -rf Payload
